KARA.TITLE: Song title
KARA.TITLE_TOOLTIP: If you don't know, put the name of the series here as well
KARA.SERIES_TOOLTIP: TV series, movie title, video game title, etc.
KARA.SERIES_SINGERS_REQUIRED: Series or singers cannot be empty in the same time.
KARA.ORDER_TOOLTIP: Opening/Ending number. If this is the only opening/ending in the series, leave blank.
KARA.YEAR_TOOLTIP: Year when the series was broadcasted or the video was produced
KARA.CREATORS_TOOLTIP: Entity that created the series. Can be animation studio, movie studio, or game studio
KARA.KARA_AUTHORS_REQUIRED: Author of the kara is mandatory
KARA.GROUPS_TOOLTIP: Download groups for this song. The song will be included in these download packs
KARA.SYNCHRONIZE_DESC: Performs all of the actions below.
KARA.UPDATE_ALL_DESC: Download only updates to songs already downloaded.
KARA.CLEAN_ALL_DESC: Deletes songs that no longer exist on the remote repository (s).
KARA.DOWNLOAD_ALL_TOOLTIP: Download all retrieved karas at once

BATCH_EDIT.CREATE_PLAYLIST: First, you need to create a playlist in the operator panel.

USERS.PASSWORD_VALIDATOR_MESSAGE: A user must have a password
USERS.LOGIN_MESSAGE: The account has to be admin. If you have an online account, remember to enter your full username (example: user@kara.moe) in the Username field
USERS.EDIT_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: Online users cannot be edited from this page except to change their role on this instance of Karaoke Mugen. To edit your own profile online, do this from the public or operator interface.

DATABASE.REGENERATE_DB_DESCRIPTION:
Regenerate database. Generation makes Karaoke Mugen aware of all the files you have in your data folders.

This is usually done when the app starts, but you may want to do this manually if :
  • You added a repository and put files inside already
  • You modified files outside the app
DATABASE.VALIDATE_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Validate all files in all enabled repositories to fix them if necessary. Maintainer use only.
DATABASE.UPDATE_MEDIA_DESCRIPTION: Karaoke repository mantainers only : If you keep your base updated through git (advanced users) this will download all medias to keep you up to date. You should rather use the download manager to get new songs.
DATABASE.DUMP_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION: Creates a karaokemugen.sql backup file in your data folder. This file can be used to create a restore point ou to send your database to the devs if they ask you to do so.
DATABASE.RESTORE_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION:
Restores your database from the file karaokemugen.sql if it's present in your data folder.

**WARNING : This will overwrite ALL non-saved data in your database : playlists, sessions, etc.)
DATABASE.UPDATE_MESSAGE_FILES: any file not in the official Karaoke Mugen repository
DATABASE.UPDATE_MESSAGE_DELETED: If you created karaokes but did not upload them, they will be deleted.

TAGS.NAME: Original name
TAGS.NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the internal name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.SHORT_NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the short name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.TYPES_TOOLTIP: This is the type of the tag in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.ALIASES_TOOLTIP: Short names or alternative names of a tag could be searched.
TAGS.I18N_TOOLTIP: There must be at least one name in any language (enter the original name by default)
TAGS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current tag with another one
TAGS.MERGE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: Resulting tags will have the current Name and Shortname. Types, Aliases and translation will be merged and the resulting tags will contain all the information from Current and targeted tags
TAGS.DELETE_TAG_MESSAGE: This will remove its tags.json file as well as in any .kara.json in your database!
TAGS.LANG_ERROR: A tag must have at least one name by language
TAGS.PROBLEMATIC_TOOLTIP: Is this tag problematic? Should it be a tag you'd want to ban? This helps mark some songs more easily in the operator/public interface. For example R18, Spoiler, or Epilepsy
TAGS.NOLIVEDOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: Karaokes with this tag won't be able to be downloaded on KMServer from the web interface, or visible on Live

CONFIG.MESSAGE: To modify a setting, just edit it and press enter. Not all settings are editable and will return an error if you try anywyay.

PROPERTIES.APP_QUICKSTART_TOOLTIP: This disables data verification. You will have to generate your database in case of modification manually from the system panel, database tab.
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_ERRORTRACKING: Send error and crash reports (via sentry.io)
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_STATS: Send usage telemetry to Karaoke Mugen Online
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_HARDWAREDECODING_TOOLTIP: Forces or not the player's hardware acceleration. Note: on some configurations, it can cause unexpected behavior during playback. In such cases, select "Disabled". The "Automatic" option is the safest, and "Force" the most risky/not recommended
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_DISCORD_DISPLAYACTIVITY: Show Karaoke Mugen activity on your Discord profile
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_PROGRESSBARDOCK: Play progress bar in Dock / Taskbar

SESSIONS.NAME: Name
SESSIONS.TITLE: Title
SESSIONS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current session with another one

REPOSITORIES.NAME: Repository name
REPOSITORIES.NAME_TOOLTIP: If it's an online repository, put its domaine name only here. If it's a local repository, name it as you want. For example 'My private little karaokes'
REPOSITORIES.MOVE_TOOLTIP: This allows you to define which repositories take priority when creating your database: the highest repositories will be taken into account first if two repositories have the same karaoke
REPOSITORIES.CONSOLIDATE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: All repository fiels (karaokes, medias, series, tags...) will be moved to the new folder as their root. If your repository has several folders for the same type of data (several media folders for example), all filles of all folders will be moved into the same target folder. If there are duplicate files, they'll be savagely overwritten.
REPOSITORIES.COMPARE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: This will allow you to compare then eventually copy lyric files from one repository to another if they differ between the two same songs. Select a repository to compare lyrics with (it will be the destination repository when comes time to copy lyrics)
REPOSITORIES.LYRICS_ARE_DIFFERENT: The lyrics of these karaokes are different between the {{first}} repository and the {{second}} repository:
REPOSITORIES.CONFIRM_SURE: Do you want to synchronize the lyrics of repository {{second}} with those of repository {{first}}?

HOME.WELCOME: Welcome to Karaoke Mugen's system panel
HOME.DIFFERENTS_MENUS: Here are the different menus you can use :
HOME.SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: See logs, change configuration options, backup/restore your database, trigger a manual generation and manage karaoke session
HOME.KARAS_DESCRIPTION_3: , and create karaoke data files. You can also edit the download blacklist and view most requested, most played, and karaoke history
HOME.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage tags (singers, songwriters, creators, song types, etc.)
HOME.USERS_DESCRIPTION_3: , change passwords, make new guests account

TASKS.CLEANING_REPO: Cleaning up songs removed from repository

ERROR_CODES.WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_API_MESSAGE: API is disabled at the moment
ERROR_CODES.BLC_EMPTY_ERROR: Error emptying list of blacklist criterias
ERROR_CODES.BL_VIEW_ERROR: Blacklist view is not allowed for users
ERROR_CODES.BLC_VIEW_FORBIDDEN: Blacklist criterias could not be viewed
ERROR_CODES.BLC_VIEW_ERROR: Blacklist criterias view is not allowed for users
ERROR_CODES.BLC_ADD_ERROR: Blacklist criteria could not be added
ERROR_CODES.PL_ADD_SONG_ERROR: No songs could be added, all are in destination playlist already
ERROR_CODES.PL_MOVE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to copy song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ERROR: Error adding downloads to the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ALREADY_ADDED_ERROR: No downloads added, all are already in queue or running
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_GET_ERROR: Error getting downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_WIPE_ERROR: Error wiping downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.AUTOMIX_ERROR_NOT_FOUND_FAV_FOR_USERS: No favorites found for those users
ERROR_CODES.KARA_SUGGESTION_ERROR: Error suggesting a new song to the database
ERROR_CODES.GITLAB_DISABLED: Gitlab support is disabled, you can't send song suggestions
ERROR_CODES.KARA_HISTORY_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by date played
ERROR_CODES.KARA_RANKING_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most requested
ERROR_CODES.KARA_PLAYED_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most played
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_ALREADY_ADD: This song has already been added
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_QUOTA_REACH: Can't add any song, quota reached
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_NO_DUPLICAT: No duplicate series or singers are allowed
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_BLACKLISTED: Song is blacklisted and cannot be added
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Error adding a song to a playlist
ERROR_CODES.SONG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying song to another repository
ERROR_CODES.TAG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying tag to another repository
ERROR_CODES.CONFIG_BACKUPED_ERROR: Error during backup of configuration file
ERROR_CODES.USER_DELETE_ADMIN_DAMEDESU: You can't remove the admin user!
ERROR_CODES.USER_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_SING: User not allowed to start the song
ERROR_CODES.PL_LIST_ERROR: Error fetching a list of playlists
ERROR_CODES.PL_VIEW_ERROR: Error fetching info from a playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to current
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_PUBLIC_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to public
ERROR_CODES.PL_SONG_COPY_ERROR: Error copying a song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_MODIFY_CONTENT_ERROR: Error modifying content's position or playing status
ERROR_CODES.UPVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to upvote one of your own additions
ERROR_CODES.DOWNVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to downvote one of your own additions
ERROR_CODES.SESSION_END_BEFORE_START_ERROR: Session end is before its beginning!
ERROR_CODES.ADMIN_CONVERT_ERROR: The account 'admin' cannot be converted to an online account
ERROR_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE_ERROR: Could not reset your password: contact the the server's administrator your account belongs to.
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOAD_SONGS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to download all songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.CLEAN_SONGS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to clean songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.SONGS_UPDATE_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to update songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.UPDATING_MEDIAS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to update medias properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COMPARE_LYRICS_ERROR: Error comparing lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COPY_LYRICS_ERROR: Error copying lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.BLC_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Error setting a blacklist criterias set to current
ERROR_CODES.BLC_COPY_ERROR: Error copying blacklist criterias to another set

SUCCESS_CODES.BASES_SYNC_IN_PROGRESS: Local and remote library sync in progress
SUCCESS_CODES.CLEAN_SONGS_IN_PROGRESS: Removing all local songs not on remote repositories
SUCCESS_CODES.SONG_COPIED: Successfully copied song to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.TAG_COPIED: Successfully copied tag to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.SESSION_EXPORTED: Session data exported in application folder
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_DELETED_ONLINE: Your online account was successfully deleted
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE: An email has been sent with a link to reset your password.
SUCCESS_CODES.REPO_LYRICS_COPIED: Copy lyrics between two repositories successfully finished
SUCCESS_CODES.STOP_AFTER: The karaoke will stop at the song end. To stop now, click again on the stop button.
